Html:
Could you please release the latest build? The current build from march is out of date and I've been trying for some time to build a version of Chirpy that works. It doesn't build out of the box and there are no build instructions.

First off, ilmerge and 7za need to be installed and in the PATH before the build will succeed. No problem. Done.

Now I can build, but i get several warnings about references. Nevertheless, it succeeds so I copy the dll into the Addin folder. The addin gets picked up by VS and is marked as enabled. But when I save any file which Chirpy should be watching I get nothing. The only output from Chirpy is "Ready" when VS starts.

I'm using a fairly fresh install of 64bit Windows 7 and VS 2010.

Warning reference : Chirpy use NuGet for package.

Check last changeset solve error with post-build event

Release new build when some issue fix :

-Problems with CSSLint (error new project)

- ...
